common.team.member1.desc1: Nate Sherrod is a web3 veteran with a proven track record of social media & community management, developing partnerships, and launching growth campaigns for projects including Wildxyz, Sphynx Labs, Palm NFT Studio, & DC Comics Bat Cowls.
common.team.member1.desc2: Now, he's bringing his expertise in community leadership to Bitcoin Pepe. A firm believer in both Bitcoin and the power of memes, Nate is excited to join the team building the first-ever DEX for the Bitcoin ecosystem. He's committed to being a valuable resource for the community and spreading positive $BEPE vibes!
common.team.member2.desc1: Collin Ford is a generational web3 leader with exceptional talent in bringing visionary ideas to life, known for his executive work, consulting, and oversight of over 100 startups since 2015, including several brands such as DexToro, My Lil Gnomie NFT, ElevenThirteen Apps, and beyond.

Currently leading marketing and biz dev at Token Metrics, and serving as Lead SMM at Vaulta. KOL with 35K+ loyal followers. He is all about creating connection, good vibes, and real engagement. Jeff Johnson is super hyped to join Bitcoin Pepe and bring some energy to grow the Bitcoin Pepe community and have a blast doing it!
common.team.member4.desc2: Now he is delivering this experience to Bitcoin Pepe, helping the project thrive with strong engagement and a clear vision.
common.team.member5.desc1: Flux has extensive experience in community building and project development, having worked on several crypto projects where he focused on driving organic growth and fostering active, engaged communities.
common.team.member5.desc2: Now, he‚Äôs bringing that expertise and unmatched energy to Bitcoin Pepe, where his primary focus is to boost engagement and effectively communicate the project's vision.
common.team.member2.desc2: With a burning passion for intriguing 21st century technology - he looks to bring his years of experience to accelerate the wide stream adoption of everything Bitcoin Pepe has to offer to the World.

common.howToBuy.site.content1: Download metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io.
common.howToBuy.site.content2: Have ETH in your wallet to switch to $BEPE. If you don‚Äôt have any ETH, you can buy directly on metamask, transfer from another wallet, or buy on another exchange and send it to your wallet.
common.howToBuy.site.title3: Go to Uniswap And Switch ETH for $BEPE
common.howToBuy.site.content3: Switch ETH for $BEPE. We have ZERO taxes so you don‚Äôt need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.
common.howToBuy.wallet.content1: To purchase BEPE, you copy the following wallet address: {{address}}. This is the address where you send your payment.
common.howToBuy.wallet.content2: Decide your total purchase amount. Note that direct-to-wallet transfers are only available on Solana.
common.howToBuy.wallet.title3: Paste the Wallet Address and Confirm the Transaction
common.howToBuy.wallet.content3: Open your wallet and paste the BEPE wallet address into the ‚ÄòRecipient‚Äôs Address‚Äô field. Enter the total amount and confirm the transaction.
